abstract: Free-agent catcher Alex Avila and Chicago White Sox agree to one-year, $2.5 million contract; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The free-agent catcher Alex Avila and the Chicago White Sox agreed to a $2.5 million, one-year contract.

headline.main: White Sox Sign Catcher From Tigers
headline.print_headline: White Sox Sign Catcher From Tigers

snippet: The free-agent catcher Alex Avila and the Chicago White Sox agreed to a $2.5 million, one-year contract.
